    app/admin/admin_users.rb

    26.83% lines covered

    164 relevant lines. 44 lines covered and 120 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            
              1
            

            

            ActiveAdmin.register AdminUser do
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
              1
            

            

              permit_params :email, :password, :password_confirmation, :role, :name, :telephone, :status
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
              1
            

            

              menu priority: 10, label: "", if: proc {
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                AdminUserPolicy.new(current_admin_user).can_index?
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              }
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8.

              # 
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              1
            

            

              controller do
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
              1
            

            

                include AuthorizationConcern
          
      11.

                # Define permission protections for all controller actions
          
      13.

                protect_action :index, with: 'AdminUserPolicy', method: :can_index?

                protect_action :show, with: 'AdminUserPolicy', method: :can_show?

                # Protect member actions

                def scoped_collection

                  end_of_association_chain.exclude_deleted

    33. 
            
              1
            

            

                def update
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  policy = AdminUserPolicy.new(current_admin_user, resource)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  if policy.can_update_own_profile?
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    # Allow self-update with restricted params
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    allowed_params = [:email, :name, :telephone]
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    if params[:admin_user][:password].present?
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                      allowed_params += [:password, :password_confirmation]
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    params[:admin_user] = params[:admin_user].permit(*allowed_params)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  super
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46.

              # Scopes for filtering

      75.

      81.

      86.

                actions defaults: false do |user|
          
      87.

                  policy = AdminUserPolicy.new(current_admin_user, user)
          
      88.

      89.

                  item "", admin_admin_user_path(user), class: "member_link" if policy.can_show?
          
      90.

                  if policy.can_edit?

                  if policy.can_soft_delete? && !user.deleted?
          
      96.

      97.

      103.

                panel "" do

                  table_for admin_user.assigned_reimbursements.recent_first.limit(10) do

      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
              1
            

            

              form do |f|
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                policy = AdminUserPolicy.new(current_admin_user, f.object)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                f.inputs "" do
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  f.input :email if policy.can_update? || policy.can_update_own_profile?
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  f.input :name if policy.can_update? || policy.can_update_own_profile?
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  f.input :telephone if policy.can_update? || policy.can_update_own_profile?
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  # Role and status only for super admins
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  f.input :role, as: :select, collection: AdminUser.roles.keys, include_blank: false if policy.show_role_field?
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  f.input :status, as: :select, collection: AdminUser.statuses.keys, include_blank: false if policy.show_status_field?
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  # Password fields for new records or self password change
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  if f.object.new_record? && policy.can_create?
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    f.input :password
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                    f.input :password_confirmation
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  elsif policy.can_change_own_password? && !f.object.new_record?
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    f.input :password, hint: ""
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                    f.input :password_confirmation, hint: ""
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                if policy.can_create? || policy.can_update? || policy.can_update_own_profile?
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  f.actions
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207.

                def status_class_for_user(user)
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                  case user.status
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                  when 'active'
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                    'ok'
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                  when 'inactive'
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                    'warning'
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                  when 'suspended'
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                    'error'
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                  when 'deleted'
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                    'error'
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                  else
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                    ''
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                  end
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

              end
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

            end

                def update
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  @audit_work_order = AuditWorkOrder.find(params[:id])
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  service = AuditWorkOrderService.new(@audit_work_order, current_admin_user) # This service might be deprecated in favor of WorkOrderService
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  update_params = audit_work_order_params_for_update
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  if update_params[:submitted_fee_detail_ids].present?
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    @audit_work_order.instance_variable_set(:@_direct_submitted_fee_ids, update_params[:submitted_fee_detail_ids])
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    # For form repopulation on error, also set the accessor if it exists
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    @audit_work_order.submitted_fee_detail_ids = update_params[:submitted_fee_detail_ids] if @audit_work_order.respond_to?(:submitted_fee_detail_ids=)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  # IDs
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  if update_params[:problem_type_ids].present?
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    @audit_work_order.problem_type_ids = update_params[:problem_type_ids]
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  # Use the centrally defined audit_work_order_params method for strong parameters
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  # The service update method should ideally only take attributes for the model itself, not the fee IDs which are handled by callback
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  if service.update(update_params.except(:submitted_fee_detail_ids, :problem_type_ids)) 
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    redirect_to admin_audit_work_order_path(@audit_work_order), notice: ''
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  else
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    # If update fails, @_direct_submitted_fee_ids might need to be preserved or reset for the form
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                    # For now, assume submitted_fee_detail_ids accessor helps repopulate via the form builder if re-rendering edit
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    render :edit
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                end
          
      117.

                private

                # Renamed to audit_work_order_params_for_update to be specific for the update action context
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
              1
            

            

                def audit_work_order_params_for_update
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  params.require(:audit_work_order).permit(
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    :processing_opinion,
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    :audit_comment,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    submitted_fee_detail_ids: [],
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    problem_type_ids: []
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  )
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              # 
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
              1
            

            

              filter :reimbursement_invoice_number, as: :string, label: ''
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
              1
            

            

              filter :status, as: :select, collection: -> { AuditWorkOrder.state_machine(:status).states.map(&:value) }
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
              1
            

            

              filter :creator, as: :select, collection: -> {
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                begin
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  collection = AdminUser.accessible_by(current_ability).map { |u|
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    label = u.name.presence || u.email.presence || " ##{u.id}"
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    [label, u.id]
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  }
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  # nilActiveAdmin
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  collection.empty? ? [['', '']] : collection
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                rescue CanCan::AccessDenied => e
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn ": #{e.message}"
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  [['', '']]
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error ": #{e.message}"
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  [['', '']]
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

              }
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
              1
            

            

              filter :created_at, label: ""
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
              1
            

            

              filter :processing_opinion, as: :string, label: ""
          
      152.

              member_action :do_approve, method: :post do
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                # Use the base WorkOrderService
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                service = WorkOrderService.new(resource, current_admin_user)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                # Params should align with what WorkOrderService and WorkOrder model expect
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                # Ensure :processing_opinion is part of the permitted params for approval logic
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                permitted_params = params.require(:audit_work_order).permit(
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  :audit_comment, :processing_opinion,
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  :vat_verified, # AuditWorkOrder specific, if still needed here
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  problem_type_ids: []
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                ).merge(processing_opinion: '') # Explicitly set for approval
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                if service.approve(permitted_params)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_audit_work_order_path(resource), notice: ""
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                else
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  @audit_work_order = resource # 
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = ": #{resource.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  render :approve
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                end
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

              end
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

            
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
              1

      236.

      242.

                # Use the base WorkOrderService
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243.

      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                # Params should align with what WorkOrderService and WorkOrder model expect
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                # Ensure :processing_opinion is part of the permitted params for rejection logic
          
      246.

      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  :audit_comment, :processing_opinion,
          
      248.

      249.

      250.

                ).merge(processing_opinion: '') # Explicitly set for rejection
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

            
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                if service.reject(permitted_params)
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_audit_work_order_path(resource), notice: ""
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                else
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                   @audit_work_order = resource # 
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = ": #{resource.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      257.

      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258.

      259.

      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

            
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
              1
            

            

              member_action :verify_fee_detail, method: :get do
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                 @work_order = resource
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                 #  fee_detail
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                 @fee_detail = @work_order.fee_details.find_by(id: params[:fee_detail_id])
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                 unless @fee_detail
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                   redirect_to admin_audit_work_order_path(@work_order), alert: " ##{params[:fee_detail_id]}"
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                   return
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                 end
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                 render 'admin/shared/verify_fee_detail'
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

              end
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

            
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
              1
            

            

              member_action :do_verify_fee_detail, method: :post do
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                # Use the base WorkOrderService for fee detail verification
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                service = WorkOrderService.new(resource, current_admin_user)
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                fee_detail_id = params[:fee_detail_id]
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                verification_status = params[:verification_status]
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                comment = params[:comment]
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

            
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                if service.update_fee_detail_verification(fee_detail_id, verification_status, comment)
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_audit_work_order_path(resource), notice: " ##{fee_detail_id} "
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                else
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                   # Errors should be on @work_order.errors from the service call if it added them,
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                   # or on @fee_detail.errors if FeeDetailVerificationService added them.
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                   # Ensure verify_fee_detail.html.erb can display errors from @work_order or @fee_detail
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                   flash.now[:alert] = " ##{fee_detail_id} "
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                   # Add specific errors to flash or ensure they are on @work_order.errors or @fee_detail.errors
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                   # Example: @work_order.errors.full_messages.join(', ')
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                   # Example: @fee_detail.errors.full_messages.join(', ')
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                   render 'admin/shared/verify_fee_detail'
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                end
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

              end
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

            
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

              # 
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            
              1
            

            

              index do
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                selectable_column
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                id_column
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                column "", :reimbursement do |wo|
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                  link_to wo.reimbursement.invoice_number, admin_reimbursement_path(wo.reimbursement)
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                end
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                column "", :processing_opinion do |wo|
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                  if wo.processing_opinion.present?
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                    status_class = case wo.processing_opinion
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                                   when ''
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                                     'ok'
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                                   when ''
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

                                     'error'
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

                                   else
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                                     'warning'
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                                   end
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

                    status_tag wo.processing_opinion, class: status_class
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                  else
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                    span "", class: "empty"
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

                  end
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                end
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                column "", :fee_details do |wo|
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

                  if wo.fee_details.any?
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                    wo.fee_details.map do |fd|
          
      318.

                    end.join("<br>").html_safe
          
      320.

              # 
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
              1
            

            

              filter :flex_field_11, as: :string, label: "11"
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
              1
            

            

              filter :flex_field_6, as: :string, label: "6()"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
              1
            

            

              filter :flex_field_7, as: :string, label: "7()"

      68.

      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              # 
          
      71.

              filter :reimbursement_applicant, as: :string, label: ""
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
              1
            

            

              filter :reimbursement_applicant_id, as: :string, label: ""
          
      73.

              collection_action :new_import, method: :get do

              collection_action :import, method: :post do
          
      96.

                authorize! :import, :all
          
      97.

                unless params[:file].present?
          
      98.

      100.

      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102.

                # 
          
      103.

                service = OptimizedFeeDetailImportService.new(params[:file], current_admin_user, skip_existing: skip_existing)

    105. 
            

            

                result = service.import
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                if result[:success]
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  notice_message = " "

    110.

      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  notice_message += ", #{result[:skipped]}" if result[:skipped].to_i > 0
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  notice_message += ", #{result[:errors]}" if result[:errors].to_i > 0
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  notice_message += ", #{result[:unmatched_reimbursement]}" if result[:unmatched_reimbursement].to_i > 0
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  
          
      115.

                  redirect_to admin_fee_details_path, notice: notice_message
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                else
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  error_msg = result[:error_details] ? result[:error_details].join(', ') :
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                              (result[:errors].is_a?(Array) ? result[:errors].join(', ') : result[:errors])
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  alert_message = " : #{error_msg}"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  redirect_to new_import_admin_fee_details_path, alert: alert_message
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123.

              1
            

            

              collection_action :export_csv, method: :get do
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                fee_details = FeeDetail.includes(:reimbursement).ransack(params[:q]).result
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                
          
      129.

                csv_data = CSV.generate(headers: true, force_quotes: true) do |csv|

    130. 
            

            

                  # CSV
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  csv << [
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    "", "", "", "", "", "",
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    "", "", "", "", "",
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    "/", "", "11", "6()", "7()",
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    "id", "", "", ""
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  ]
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  fee_details.find_each do |fee_detail|
          
      140.

                    reimbursement = fee_detail.reimbursement

    141. 
            

            

                    
          
      142.

      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                      fee_detail.month_belonging,
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                      fee_detail.fee_type,
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                      reimbursement&.applicant,
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                      reimbursement&.applicant_id,
          
      147.

                      reimbursement&.company,
          
      148.

      149.

                      fee_detail.flex_field_11,
          
      157.

                      fee_detail.flex_field_6,
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                      fee_detail.flex_field_7,
          
      159.

                      fee_detail.external_fee_id,
          
      160.

                      fee_detail.first_submission_date,
          
      161.

                end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                #  UTF-8 BOM Excel  UTF-8 
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                bom = "\xEF\xBB\xBF"
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                csv_data = bom + csv_data
          
      170.

      173.

      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

              end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              1
            

            

              index do

                selectable_column
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                id_column
          
      179.

                column "", :document_number do |fee_detail|
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  if fee_detail.reimbursement
          
      181.

                    link_to fee_detail.document_number, admin_reimbursement_path(fee_detail.reimbursement)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  else
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                    fee_detail.document_number
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                end
          
      186.

                column :fee_type
          
      187.

      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  number_to_currency(fee_detail.amount, unit: "")
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                end
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                column "", :verification_status do |fee_detail|
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  status_tag fee_detail.verification_status
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                column "" do |fee_detail|
          
      194.

                  latest_wo = fee_detail.latest_associated_work_order
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  if latest_wo
          
      196.

      197.

                  else
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    ""
          
      199.

                  end
          
      200.

                end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                column "" do |fee_detail|
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  latest_wo = fee_detail.latest_associated_work_order
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  if latest_wo && latest_wo.problem_types.any?
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    problem_details = latest_wo.problem_types.map do |problem_type|

                      "#{problem_type.legacy_problem_code}-#{problem_type.title}-#{problem_type.sop_description}+#{problem_type.standard_handling}"

                    end.join("\n")
          
      208.

                    content_tag(:pre, problem_details,
          
      210.

      211.

      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  else
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                    ""
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                end
          
      216.

                actions

                      attributes_table_for resource do
          
      267.

                        # FeeDetail fields

                        row "ID" do |fee_detail|

                          fee_detail.external_fee_id

                        end
          
      271.

                  tab " (#{resource.work_orders.count})" do

      350.

      351.

                          end

      355.

                  tab " (#{resource.attachment_count})" do

                      if resource.attachments.attached?

                          resource.attachments.each do |attachment|

      382.

      388.

      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            

                                    end
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391.

      435.

      436.

              1
            

            

              form do |f|
          
      437.

                f.inputs "" do

      439.

                  f.input :external_fee_id

                  f.input :fee_date, as: :datepicker
          
      443.

      444. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    444. 
            

            

                  f.input :month_belonging
          
      445. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    445.

      446.

                  f.input :plan_or_pre_application
          
      447.

      450.

      451.

      453.

      454.

    455. 
            

            

                f.inputs "" do
          
      456.

                  f.input :attachments, as: :file, input_html: {
          
      457. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    457. 
            

            

                    multiple: true,
          
      458.

                    accept: "image/*,.pdf,.doc,.docx,.xls,.xlsx",
          
      459.

                    class: "attachment-upload"
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            

            

                  }, hint: "PDFWordExcel10MB"
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            

            

                  
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            

            

                  if f.object.persisted? && f.object.attachments.attached?
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            

            

                    div class: "current-attachments" do
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            

            

                      h4 ""
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            

            

                      ul do
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            

            

                        f.object.attachments.each do |attachment|
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            

            

                          li do
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            

            

                            if attachment.image?
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            

            

                              image_tag attachment.variant(resize_to_limit: [100, 100]),
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            

            

                                       style: "max-width: 100px; margin-right: 10px;"
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            

            

                            end
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            

            

                            span attachment.filename.to_s
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            

            

                            span " (#{number_to_human_size(attachment.byte_size)})"
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            

            

                            link_to "", rails_blob_path(attachment, disposition: "attachment"),
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            

            

                                    class: "button small", style: "margin-left: 10px;"
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            

            

                          end
          
      477.

                def apply_sorting(chain)

    102. 
            

            

                Reimbursement.where.not(erp_current_approval_node: [nil, '']).distinct.pluck(:erp_current_approval_node).compact.sort
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

              }
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
              1
            

            

              filter :erp_current_approver, label: "", as: :select, collection: -> {

    113.

      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114.

              filter :with_unread_updates, label: '', as: :boolean

                           title: "",

                           if: proc {

                             ReimbursementPolicy.new(current_admin_user).can_batch_assign?

              1
            

            

              collection_action :import, method: :post do
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                # 
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                unless params[:file].present?
          
      275.

                   redirect_to new_import_admin_reimbursements_path, alert: ""
          
      276.

      277.

                end
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                # 
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                service = SimpleBatchReimbursementImportService.new(params[:file], current_admin_user)
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                result = service.import
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

            
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                if result[:success]
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                  notice_message = " "
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                  notice_message += "  : #{result[:created]}, #{result[:updated]}"
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                  notice_message += ", #{result[:errors]}" if result[:errors].to_i > 0
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                  
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                  if result[:processing_time]
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                    processing_time = result[:processing_time].round(2)
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                    total_records = (result[:created].to_i + result[:updated].to_i)
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                    if total_records > 0 && processing_time > 0
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                      records_per_second = (total_records / processing_time).round(0)
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                      notice_message += "  : #{records_per_second}/, #{processing_time}"
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                    end
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                  end
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                  
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_reimbursements_path, notice: notice_message
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                else
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                  error_msg = result[:error_details] ? result[:error_details].join(', ') : result[:errors]
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                  alert_message = " : #{error_msg}"
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                  redirect_to new_import_admin_reimbursements_path, alert: alert_message
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                end
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

              end
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

            
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

              # CSV

                    panel "" do
          
      452.

                      table_for resource.fee_details.includes(:work_orders).order(
          
      453. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    453. 
            

            

                        Arel.sql("CASE WHEN verification_status = 'problematic' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END"),
          
      454. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    454. 
            

            

                        created_at: :desc
          
      455. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    455. 
            

            

                      ) do
          
      456.

                        column("id") { |fd| link_to fd.id, admin_fee_detail_path(fd) }
          
      457. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    457. 
            

            

                        column "" do |fee_detail|
          
      458. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    458. 
            

            

                          latest_wo = fee_detail.latest_associated_work_order
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            

            

                          if latest_wo
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            

            

                            link_to "##{latest_wo.id}", [:admin, latest_wo]
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            

            

                          else
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            

            

                            ""
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            

            

                          end
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            

            

                        end
          
      465.

                        column "", :verification_status do |fd| status_tag fd.verification_status end

      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            

            

                          fd.fee_date&.strftime("%Y-%m-%d") || ""
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469.

      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            

            

                        column "", :amount do |fd| number_to_currency(fd.amount, unit: "") end
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            

            

                        column "" do |fee_detail|
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            

            

                          latest_wo = fee_detail.latest_associated_work_order
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            

            

                          if latest_wo && latest_wo.problem_types.any?
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            

            

                            problem_details = latest_wo.problem_types.map do |problem_type|
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            

            

                              "#{problem_type.legacy_problem_code}-#{problem_type.title}-#{problem_type.sop_description}+#{problem_type.standard_handling}"
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            

            

                            end.join("\n")
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            

            

                            
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            

            

                            content_tag(:pre, problem_details,
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            

            

                              class: "problem-type-plain-text",
          
      480. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    480. 
            

            

                              style: "white-space: pre-wrap; margin: 0; font-family: monospace; font-size: 12px;")
          
      481. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    481. 
            

            

                          else
          
      482. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    482. 
            

            

                            ""
          
      483. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    483. 
            

            

                          end
          
      484. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    484. 
            

            

                        end

      680.

    681. 
            

            

                          span ": #{number_to_human_size(total_size)}"
          
      682. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    682. 
            

            

                        end
          
      683.

                          column "", :fee_type

      692. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    692. 
            

            

                          column "" do |fd|
          
      693. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    693. 
            

            

                            div class: "attachment-preview", style: "display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 10px;" do
          
      694. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    694. 
            

            

                              fd.attachments.limit(3).each do |attachment|
          
      695. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    695. 
            

            

                                div class: "attachment-item", style: "border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 8px; border-radius: 3px; max-width: 120px;" do
          
      696. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    696. 
            

            

                                  if attachment.image?
          
      697. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    697. 
            

            

                                    image_tag attachment.variant(resize_to_limit: [60, 60]),
          
      698. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    698. 
            

            

                                             style: "max-width: 60px; height: auto; display: block; margin-bottom: 5px;"
          
      699. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    699. 
            

            

                                  else
          
      700. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    700. 
            

            

                                    div style: "text-align: center; padding: 15px; background: #f5f5f5;" do
          
      701. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    701. 
            

            

                                      case attachment.content_type
          
      702. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    702. 
            

            

                                      when 'application/pdf'
          
      703. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    703. 
            

            

                                        span "", style: "font-size: 20px;"
          
      704. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    704. 
            

            

                                      when /word/
          
      705. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    705. 
            

            

                                        span "", style: "font-size: 20px;"
          
      706. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    706. 
            

            

                                      when /excel|sheet/
          
      707. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    707. 
            

            

                                        span "", style: "font-size: 20px;"
          
      708. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    708. 
            

            

                                      else
          
      709. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    709. 
            

            

                                        span "", style: "font-size: 20px;"
          
      710. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    710. 
            

            

                                      end
          
      711. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    711. 
            

            

                                    end
          
      712. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    712. 
            

            

                                  end
          
      713. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    713. 
            

            

                                  
          
      714. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    714. 
            

            

                                  div style: "font-size: 11px; text-align: center;" do
          
      715. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    715. 
            

            

                                    div truncate(attachment.filename.to_s, length: 15)
          
      716. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    716. 
            

            

                                    div "#{number_to_human_size(attachment.byte_size)}", style: "color: #666;"
          
      717. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    717. 
            

            

                                  end
          
      718. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    718. 
            

            

                                  
          
      719. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    719. 
            

            

                                  div style: "text-align: center; margin-top: 5px;" do
          
      720. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    720. 
            

            

                                    link_to "", rails_blob_path(attachment, disposition: "attachment"),
          
      721. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    721. 
            

            

                                            class: "button small", style: "font-size: 10px; padding: 2px 6px;"
          
      722. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    722. 
            

            

                                  end
          
      723. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    723. 
            

            

                                end
          
      724. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    724. 
            

            

                              end
          
      725. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    725. 
            

            

                              
          
      726. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    726. 
            

            

                              if fd.attachment_count > 3
          
      727. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    727. 
            

            

                                div style: "display: flex; align-items: center; color: #666; font-size: 12px;" do
          
      728. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    728. 
            

            

                                  " #{fd.attachment_count - 3} ..."
          
      729. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    729. 
            

            

                                end
          
      730. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    730. 
            

            

                              end
          
      731. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    731. 
            

            

                            end
          
      732. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    732. 
            

            

                          end
          
      733. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    733. 
            

            

                          column "" do |fd|
          
      734. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    734. 
            

            

                            div do
          
      735. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    735. 
            

            

                              strong "#{fd.attachment_count}"
          
      736. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    736. 
            

            

                              br
          
      737. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    737. 
            

            

                              span "#{number_to_human_size(fd.attachment_total_size)}"
          
      738. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    738. 
            

            

                              br
          
      739. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    739. 
            

            

                              small fd.attachment_types_summary, style: "color: #666;"
          
      740. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    740. 
            

            

                            end
          
      741. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    741. 
            

            

                          end

              # Existing member_action :close (used by "" button)
          
      807. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    807. 
            
              1
            

            

              member_action :close, method: :put do
          
      808.

                begin
          
      809. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    809.

      811. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    811. 
            

            

                rescue StateMachines::InvalidTransition => e
          
      812. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    812.

      813. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    813. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      814.

      815.
