              # Update and notification queries
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              def self.with_unread_updates
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                where(has_updates: true)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  .where('last_viewed_at IS NULL OR last_update_at > last_viewed_at')
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

              end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

              def self.with_unviewed_operation_histories
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                where('last_viewed_operation_histories_at IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM operation_histories WHERE operation_histories.document_number = reimbursements.invoice_number AND operation_histories.created_at > reimbursements.last_viewed_operation_histories_at)')
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

              end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

              def self.with_unviewed_express_receipts
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                where('last_viewed_express_receipts_at IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM work_orders WHERE work_orders.reimbursement_id = reimbursements.id AND work_orders.type = \'ExpressReceiptWorkOrder\' AND work_orders.created_at > COALESCE(reimbursements.last_viewed_express_receipts_at, reimbursements.created_at))')
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

              def self.with_unviewed_records
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                with_unviewed_operation_histories.or(with_unviewed_express_receipts)
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

              end
          
      168.

              def self.update_all(updates, conditions = nil)

    248. 
            

            

                if conditions

              def self.for_user_dashboard(user_id)
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                assigned = assigned_to_user(user_id)
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                unread = with_unread_updates_for_user(user_id)
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

            
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                # Combine the queries
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                from("(#{assigned.to_sql} UNION #{unread.to_sql}) AS reimbursements")
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

              end
          
      289.

              def self.safe_find(id)

    303.

      306.

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            # app/services/attachment_upload_service.rb
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            class AttachmentUploadService
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              attr_reader :reimbursement, :params
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def initialize(reimbursement, params)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @reimbursement = reimbursement
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @params = params
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              end
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def upload
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                begin
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  fee_detail = build_fee_detail
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  fee_detail.attachments.attach(params[:attachments]) if params[:attachments].present?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  if fee_detail.save
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    { success: true, fee_detail: fee_detail }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  else
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    { success: false, error: fee_detail.errors.full_messages.join(', ') }
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  { success: false, error: e.message }
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              private
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              def build_fee_detail
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                FeeDetail.new(
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  document_number: reimbursement.invoice_number,
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  external_fee_id: generate_external_fee_id,
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  fee_type: 'ATTACHMENT_EVIDENCE',
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  amount: 0.00,
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  verification_status: 'pending',
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  notes: params[:notes]
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                )
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              def generate_external_fee_id
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                "ATTACHMENT_#{reimbursement.invoice_number}_#{Time.current.strftime('%Y%m%d%H%M%S')}_#{SecureRandom.hex(3).upcase}"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            end
          
      44.

    app/services/audit_work_order_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    6 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 6 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # app/services/audit_work_order_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            class AuditWorkOrderService < WorkOrderService
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def initialize(audit_work_order, current_admin_user)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                super(audit_work_order, current_admin_user)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @audit_work_order = audit_work_order
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              end
          
      9.

              # The generic WorkOrderService#approve and WorkOrderService#reject methods

              # will now be used, which call the state machine events.

              # The update method from WorkOrderService is now more generic.

      17.

              # (which is assign_shared_attributes + save), it can be overridden here.

              # We remove the specific `update` method from AuditWorkOrderService if its primary role
          
      21.

              # was to set resolution/status based on processing_opinion, as this is now handled by explicit event calls
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              # in the parent service for approve/reject, and the parent update is now generic.
          
      23.

              # However, if it had other specific logic, that should be preserved or re-evaluated.
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              # Based on the previous content, its main unique logic was setting :resolution and validating based on opinion.
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              # Let's simplify and assume for now that specific validations related to 'rejected' state
          
      27.

      28.

              def update(params = {})

      28.

      29.

            class ExpressReceiptImportService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              TRACKING_NUMBER_REGEX = /[:]\s*(\w+)/i # 
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def initialize(file, current_admin_user)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @file = file
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @current_admin_user = current_admin_user
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @created_count = 0
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @skipped_count = 0 # 
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @error_count = 0
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                @errors = []
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                @unmatched_receipts = []
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                Current.admin_user = current_admin_user #  Current.admin_user 
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              def import(test_spreadsheet = nil)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                return { success: false, errors: [""] } unless @file.present?
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                return { success: false, errors: [""] } unless @current_admin_user
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                begin
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  file_path = if @file.respond_to?(:tempfile)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                               @file.tempfile.to_path.to_s
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                             else
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                               @file.path
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                             end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  extension = File.extname(file_path).downcase[1..-1]
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  unless %w[csv xls xlsx].include?(extension)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    return { success: false, errors: [" CSV  Excel "] }
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  spreadsheet = test_spreadsheet || Roo::Spreadsheet.open(file_path, extension: extension.to_sym)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  # Handle both Excel and CSV files
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  sheet = if spreadsheet.respond_to?(:sheet)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                            spreadsheet.sheet(0)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                          else
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                            spreadsheet # Directly use spreadsheet if it's a CSV
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                          end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  headers = sheet.row(1).map { |h| h.to_s.strip }
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "CSV Headers: #{headers.inspect}"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  sheet.each_with_index do |row, idx|
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    next if idx == 0
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    row_data = Hash[headers.zip(row)]
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Row #{idx + 1} data: #{row_data.inspect}"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    import_express_receipt(row_data, idx + 1)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  {
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    success: true,
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    created: @created_count,
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    skipped: @skipped_count,
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    unmatched: @unmatched_receipts.count,
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    errors: @error_count,
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    error_details: @errors,
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    unmatched_details: @unmatched_receipts
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  }
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Express Receipt Import Failed: #{e.message}\n#{e.backtrace.join("\n")}"
          
      64.

                  { success: false, errors: [": #{e.message}"] }
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              private
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              def import_express_receipt(row, row_number)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                # 
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "ExpressReceiptImportService:  #{row_number} : #{row.inspect}"
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                document_number = row['']&.strip || row['']&.strip # 
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                operation_notes = row['']&.strip
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                received_at_str = row[''] || row[''] # 
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                filling_id = row['Filling ID']&.strip
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                # 
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80.

      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                # 
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                tracking_number = operation_notes&.match(TRACKING_NUMBER_REGEX)&.captures&.first&.strip
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                unless document_number.present? && tracking_number.present?
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  @error_count += 1
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  @errors << " #{row_number}: "
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  return
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                # 
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92.

    94. 
            

            

                unless reimbursement
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95.

      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  return
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98.

    99. 
            

            

                #  filling_id

                if filling_id.present?
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  work_order = ExpressReceiptWorkOrder.find_by(filling_id: filling_id)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102.

      104.

      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    return
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  received_at = parse_datetime(received_at_str)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111.

      113.

                  if received_at.nil?
          
      116.

      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                      @errors << " #{row_number}:  '#{received_at_str}'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SSYYYY/MM/DD HH:MM:SS"
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                      return
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    else
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "ExpressReceiptImportService:  #{row_number} "
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                      @error_count += 1
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                      @errors << " #{row_number}: "
          
      125.

                      return
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    end
          
      127.

                  end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  if received_at > Time.current + 1.day
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "ExpressReceiptImportService:  #{row_number}  #{received_at} "
          
      132.

              def parse_datetime(datetime_string)
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                return nil unless datetime_string.present?
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                # 
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                return datetime_string if datetime_string.is_a?(Date) || datetime_string.is_a?(DateTime) || datetime_string.is_a?(Time)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                datetime_str = datetime_string.to_s.strip
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                return nil if datetime_str.blank?
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                # Excel
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                # Excel
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                if datetime_str.match?(/^\d+(\.\d+)?$/)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "ExpressReceiptImportService: Excel: '#{datetime_str}'"
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                  return nil
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                end
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                begin
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                  return DateTime.parse(datetime_str)
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                    # 
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                    common_formats = [
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                      '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S',    # 2025-01-01 10:00:00
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                      '%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S',    # 2025/01/01 10:00:00
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                      '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M',       # 2025-01-01 10:00
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                      '%Y/%m/%d %H:%M',       # 2025/01/01 10:00
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                      '%Y-%m-%d',             # 2025-01-01
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                      '%Y/%m/%d',             # 2025/01/01
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                      '%d/%m/%Y %H:%M:%S',    # 01/01/2025 10:00:00
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                      '%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S',    # 01/01/2025 10:00:00
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                      '%d-%m-%Y %H:%M:%S',    # 01-01-2025 10:00:00
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                      '%m-%d-%Y %H:%M:%S',    # 01-01-2025 10:00:00
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                    ]
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                    
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                    common_formats.each do |format|
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                      begin
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                        parsed_time = DateTime.strptime(datetime_str, format)
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.debug "ExpressReceiptImportService:  '#{datetime_str}'  '#{format}' => #{parsed_time}"
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                        return parsed_time
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                      rescue ArgumentError
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                        # 
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                      end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                    end
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                    
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                    # 
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn "ExpressReceiptImportService: : '#{datetime_str}': #{common_formats.inspect}"
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                    return nil
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "ExpressReceiptImportService: : '#{datetime_str}' - #{e.message}"
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                    return nil
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                  end
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                end
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

              end
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

            end
          
      294.

            class ExpressReceiptWorkOrderService

    3. 
            

            

              def initialize(express_receipt_work_order, current_admin_user)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                raise ArgumentError, "Expected ExpressReceiptWorkOrder" unless express_receipt_work_order.is_a?(ExpressReceiptWorkOrder)

    5. 
            

            

                @express_receipt_work_order = express_receipt_work_order

    6.

      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7.

              def work_order
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                @express_receipt_work_order
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              # 
          
      19.

              def reimbursement

                @express_receipt_work_order.reimbursement

              end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              
          
      23.

              # 
          
      24.

              def tracking_number

      33.

              #

              def update_tracking_info(params)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                @express_receipt_work_order.update(params.slice(:tracking_number, :courier_name, :received_at))

    36. 
            

            

              end
          
      37.

            end

    app/services/fee_detail_group_service.rb

            # app/services/fee_detail_group_service.rb

            class FeeDetailGroupService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              def initialize(fee_detail_ids)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                @fee_detail_ids = Array(fee_detail_ids).map(&:to_i).uniq
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                @fee_details = FeeDetail.where(id: @fee_detail_ids)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              end
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8.

              def group_by_fee_type
          
      10.

                # 
          
      11.

                result = {}
          
      12.

      13.

                @fee_details.each do |fee_detail|
          
      14.

      25.

              def available_problem_types

              def problem_types_by_fee_type

                    id: problem_type.id,

              def get_fee_type_id(fee_type_name)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                # 
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                fee_type = FeeType.find_by("title LIKE ? OR code LIKE ?", "%#{fee_type_name}%", "%#{fee_type_name}%")
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                fee_type&.id
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            end

            require 'securerandom'
          
      3.

            class FeeDetailImportService
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def initialize(file, current_admin_user)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @file = file
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @current_admin_user = current_admin_user
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @created_count = 0 # Changed from imported_count
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @updated_count = 0 # Added for clarity
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @skipped_due_to_error_count = 0 # Renamed from error_count for clarity on unprocessable rows
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                @errors = [] # Stores detailed error messages for rows that couldn't be processed
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                @unmatched_reimbursement_count = 0 # Renamed from unmatched_details.count
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                @unmatched_reimbursement_details = [] # Renamed from unmatched_details
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                Current.admin_user = current_admin_user #  Current.admin_user 
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                @optimization_manager = SqliteOptimizationManager.new(level: :moderate)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              def import(test_spreadsheet = nil)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                return { success: false, errors: [""] } unless @file.present?
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                # SQLite
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                @optimization_manager.during_import do
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  perform_import(test_spreadsheet)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              private
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              def perform_import(test_spreadsheet = nil)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                begin
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  file_path = @file.respond_to?(:tempfile) ? @file.tempfile.to_path.to_s : @file.path
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  extension = File.extname(file_path).delete('.').downcase.to_sym
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  spreadsheet = test_spreadsheet || Roo::Spreadsheet.open(file_path, extension: extension)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  sheet = if spreadsheet.respond_to?(:sheet)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                            spreadsheet.sheet(0)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                          else
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                            spreadsheet
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                          end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  headers = sheet.row(1).map { |h| h.to_s.strip }
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  # Validate essential headers (id is optional for backward compatibility)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  expected_headers = ['', '', '', ''] # Add other essential headers if any
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  missing_headers = expected_headers - headers
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  unless missing_headers.empty?
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    return { success: false, errors: ["CSV: #{missing_headers.join(', ')}"] }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  sheet.each_with_index do |row, idx|
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    next if idx == 0 # Skip header row
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    row_data = Hash[headers.zip(row)]
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    import_fee_detail(row_data, idx + 1)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  # Limit the amount of data returned to prevent session overflow
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  # Store only counts and a limited number of error messages
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  error_summary = @errors.empty? ? [] : @errors.take(10)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  if @errors.size > 10
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    error_summary << "... and #{@errors.size - 10} more errors"
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  {
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    success: @errors.empty?,
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    created: @created_count,
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    updated: @updated_count,
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    unmatched_reimbursement: @unmatched_reimbursement_count,
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    skipped_errors: @skipped_due_to_error_count,
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    error_details: error_summary,
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    # Don't include the full unmatched_reimbursement_details array to save space
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    unmatched_count: @unmatched_reimbursement_details.size
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  }
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                rescue Roo::FileNotFound => e
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Fee Detail Import Failed: File not found - #{e.message}\n#{e.backtrace.join("\n")}"
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: [": #{e.message}"] }
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                rescue CSV::MalformedCSVError => e
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Fee Detail Import Failed: Malformed CSV - #{e.message}\n#{e.backtrace.join("\n")}"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: ["CSV: #{e.message}"] }
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Fee Detail Import Failed: #{e.message}\n#{e.backtrace.join("\n")}"
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: [": #{e.message}"] }
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

              def import_fee_detail(row, row_number)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                external_id = row['id']&.to_s&.strip
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                document_number = row['']&.to_s&.strip
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                fee_type = row['']&.to_s&.strip
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                amount_str = row['']
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                fee_date_str = row['']
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                # external_id is optional for backward compatibility
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                # Generate a unique ID if not provided
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                if external_id.blank?
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  external_id = "AUTO_#{document_number}_#{SecureRandom.hex(4)}"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                # 
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                unless document_number.present? && fee_type.present? && amount_str.present? && fee_date_str.present?
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  @skipped_due_to_error_count += 1
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  @errors << " #{row_number}:  (, , , )"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  return
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                # 
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                reimbursement = Reimbursement.find_by(invoice_number: document_number)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                unless reimbursement
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  @unmatched_reimbursement_count += 1
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  @unmatched_reimbursement_details << { row: row_number, external_fee_id: external_id, document_number: document_number, error: "" }
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  return
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                #  external_fee_id 
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                existing_fee_detail = FeeDetail.find_by(external_fee_id: external_id)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                # document_number
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                if existing_fee_detail && existing_fee_detail.document_number != document_number
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  @skipped_due_to_error_count += 1
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  @errors << " #{row_number} (ID: #{external_id}):  - : #{existing_fee_detail.document_number}, : #{document_number}"
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  return
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                # 
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                fee_detail = existing_fee_detail || FeeDetail.new(external_fee_id: external_id)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                is_new_record = fee_detail.new_record?
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                attributes = {
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  document_number: document_number,
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  fee_type: fee_type,
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  amount: parse_decimal(amount_str),
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  fee_date: parse_date(fee_date_str),
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  verification_status: fee_detail.verification_status || FeeDetail::VERIFICATION_STATUS_PENDING, # 
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  month_belonging: row['']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  first_submission_date: parse_datetime(row['']&.to_s&.strip),
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  plan_or_pre_application: row['/']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  product: row['']&.to_s&.strip,
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  flex_field_11: row['11']&.to_s&.strip,

      140.

      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                }

      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                fee_detail.assign_attributes(attributes)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                if fee_detail.save
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  if is_new_record
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    @created_count += 1
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info ": external_fee_id=#{external_id}, document_number=#{document_number}"
          
      150.

                  else

      153.

                  end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  reimbursement.update_status_based_on_fee_details!
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  # document_number
          
      159.

                  if existing_fee_detail && existing_fee_detail.document_number != document_number && defined?(old_reimbursement) && old_reimbursement
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    #

                  @skipped_due_to_error_count += 1
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  @errors << " #{row_number} (ID: #{external_id}):  - #{fee_detail.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      166.

                  Rails.logger.error ": external_fee_id=#{external_id}, errors=#{fee_detail.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

              end
          
      169.

      170.

              def parse_date(date_string)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                return nil unless date_string.present?
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                begin
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  date_string.is_a?(Date) || date_string.is_a?(DateTime) ? date_string.to_date : Date.parse(date_string.to_s)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

              end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

              
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              def parse_datetime(datetime_string)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                return nil unless datetime_string.present?
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                begin
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  datetime_string.is_a?(Date) || datetime_string.is_a?(DateTime) ? datetime_string : DateTime.parse(datetime_string.to_s)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

              def parse_decimal(decimal_string)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                return 0 unless decimal_string.present?
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                begin
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  value = BigDecimal(decimal_string.to_s.gsub(',', '')) # 
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  # If parsing succeeds but results in 0 or negative, return 0
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  value.positive? ? value : 0
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  0 # Return 0 instead of nil for invalid values
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

              end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

            end
          
      199.
