            class FeeDetailStatusService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              def initialize(fee_detail_ids = nil)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                @fee_detail_ids = Array(fee_detail_ids)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              end
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # Update status for specific fee details
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              def update_status
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                fee_details = @fee_detail_ids.present? ? 
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  FeeDetail.where(id: @fee_detail_ids) : 
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  FeeDetail.all
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                fee_details.find_each do |fee_detail|
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  update_fee_detail_status(fee_detail)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              # Update status for fee details related to a specific work order
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              def update_status_for_work_order(work_order)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                # Get all fee details associated with this work order - 
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                fee_detail_ids = work_order.work_order_fee_details.pluck(:fee_detail_id)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                # Update their status
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                FeeDetail.where(id: fee_detail_ids).find_each do |fee_detail|
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  update_fee_detail_status(fee_detail)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              private
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              def update_fee_detail_status(fee_detail)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                # 
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status:  ##{fee_detail.id}, : #{fee_detail.verification_status}"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                # Get the latest work order associated with this fee detail
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                latest_work_order = get_latest_work_order(fee_detail)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                if latest_work_order.nil?
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status:  pending"
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  # If no work orders, keep or set to pending
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  unless fee_detail.verification_status == "pending"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    fee_detail.update(verification_status: "pending")
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status:  pending"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  return
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status:  ##{latest_work_order.id}, : #{latest_work_order.type}, : #{latest_work_order.status}"
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                # Apply the "latest work order decides" principle
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                new_status = determine_status_from_work_order(latest_work_order)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status: : #{new_status}"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                # Update only if status has changed
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                if fee_detail.verification_status != new_status
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status:  #{fee_detail.verification_status}  #{new_status}"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  result = fee_detail.update(verification_status: new_status)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status: : #{result}, : #{fee_detail.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                else
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "FeeDetailStatusService#update_fee_detail_status:  #{fee_detail.verification_status}"
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              def get_latest_work_order(fee_detail)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                # 
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                fee_detail.work_orders
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                           .where.not(type: 'CommunicationWorkOrder')
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                           .order(updated_at: :desc)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                           .first
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              def determine_status_from_work_order(work_order)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                # Skip express receipt work orders as they don't affect verification status
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                return "pending" if work_order.is_a?(ExpressReceiptWorkOrder)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                # Skip communication work orders as they don't affect verification status
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                return "pending" if work_order.is_a?(CommunicationWorkOrder)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                case work_order.status
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                when "approved"
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  "verified"
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                when "rejected"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  "problematic"
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                else
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  # For pending or other statuses, keep as pending
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  "pending"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            end
          
      90.

    app/services/fee_detail_verification_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    59 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 59 lines missed.

            # app/services/fee_detail_verification_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            class FeeDetailVerificationService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              def initialize(current_admin_user)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                @current_admin_user = current_admin_user
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                Current.admin_user = current_admin_user #  Current 
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              end
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              # 
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              def update_verification_status(fee_detail, status, comment = nil)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[FeeDetailVerificationService] Updating FeeDetail ##{fee_detail.id} to status: #{status}"
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                #  status 
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                normalized_status = normalize_status(status)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                unless normalized_status
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  fee_detail.errors.add(:verification_status, ": #{status}")
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "[FeeDetailVerificationService] Invalid verification status: #{status} for FeeDetail ##{fee_detail.id}"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                if fee_detail.reimbursement&.closed?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  fee_detail.errors.add(:base, "")
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "[FeeDetailVerificationService] Reimbursement closed for FeeDetail ##{fee_detail.id}. Cannot update status."
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "[FeeDetailVerificationService] Normalized status to: #{normalized_status} for FeeDetail ##{fee_detail.id}"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                update_params = { verification_status: normalized_status }
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                update_params[:notes] = comment if comment.present? #  comment  notes
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                result = fee_detail.update(update_params)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                if result
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "[FeeDetailVerificationService] Successfully updated FeeDetail ##{fee_detail.id}."
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  #  ( FeeDetail  verification_status )
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  #  Service 
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  # FeeDetail  after_commit :update_reimbursement_status 
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  if fee_detail.reimbursement&.persisted? # Ensure reimbursement exists and is persisted
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                     fee_detail.reimbursement.reload.update_status_based_on_fee_details!
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                     Rails.logger.info "[FeeDetailVerificationService] Triggered reimbursement status update for Reimbursement ##{fee_detail.reimbursement.id}."
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                else
          
      44.

                  Rails.logger.error "[FeeDetailVerificationService] Failed to update FeeDetail ##{fee_detail.id}: #{fee_detail.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      45.

                end

                result

              def batch_update_verification_status(fee_details, status, comment = nil)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                normalized_status = normalize_status(status)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                unless normalized_status
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54.

      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    return false # 
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57.

                #  fee_details  ActiveRecord::Relation, to_a

                return true if fee_details.to_a.empty? # 
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                all_succeeded = true

    62. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  fee_details.each do |fee_detail|
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    unless update_verification_status(fee_detail, normalized_status, comment)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      all_succeeded = false
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      raise ActiveRecord::Rollback # 
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    end
          
      68.

                  end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                end
          
      70.

      73.

              def normalize_status(status_param)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                #  status () 
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                # FeeDetail::VERIFICATION_STATUSES  [PENDING, PROBLEMATIC, VERIFIED]
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                status_string = status_param.to_s.downcase # 
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                return status_string if FeeDetail::VERIFICATION_STATUSES.include?(status_string)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                # 
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                return status_param if FeeDetail::VERIFICATION_STATUSES.include?(status_param)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                nil #  nil
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

              end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            end

            class FillingIdGenerator
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              def self.generate(received_at)
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                time = received_at || Time.current
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                year_month = time.strftime('%Y%m')
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                sequence = next_sequence(year_month)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                "#{year_month}#{sequence.to_s.rjust(4, '0')}"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              
          
      10.

              private
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def self.next_sequence(year_month)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # +1
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # ArelSQL
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                max_sequence = ExpressReceiptWorkOrder
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  .where("filling_id LIKE ?", "#{year_month}%")
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  .maximum(Arel.sql("CAST(SUBSTRING(filling_id, 7, 4) AS INTEGER)")) || 0
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                max_sequence + 1
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            end
          
      21.

              def import(test_spreadsheet = nil)

              def validate_headers(headers)

    87. 
            

            

                errors = []

                FIELD_MAPPINGS.each do |field_key, possible_names|

                  found = possible_names.any? { |name| headers.include?(name) }
          
      93.

              def build_field_mapping(headers)

    131. 
            

            

                mapping = {}
          
      132.

                FIELD_MAPPINGS.each do |field_key, possible_names|

                  found_field = possible_names.find { |name| headers.include?(name) }
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  mapping[field_key] = found_field if found_field
          
      136.

      137.

              def similar_field?(header, possible_names)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                possible_names.any? do |name|
          
      143.

                  # 
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  name_keywords = name.split(/[:\s]/)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  header_keywords = header.split(/[:\s]/)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  name_keywords.any? { |keyword| header.include?(keyword) } ||
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  header_keywords.any? { |keyword| name.include?(keyword) }
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

              end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

              
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              def extract_field_value(row, field_key, field_map)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                field_name = field_map[field_key]
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                return nil unless field_name
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                value = row[field_name]
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                value.is_a?(String) ? value.strip : value
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

              end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

              
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

              def import_express_receipt_with_mapping(row, row_number, field_map)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                # 
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                document_number = extract_field_value(row, :document_number, field_map)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                operation_notes = extract_field_value(row, :operation_notes, field_map)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                received_at_str = extract_field_value(row, :received_at, field_map)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                filling_id = extract_field_value(row, :filling_id, field_map)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug " #{row_number}  - : #{document_number.inspect}, : #{operation_notes.inspect}, : #{received_at_str.inspect}"
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                # 
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                validation_errors = []
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                unless document_number.present?
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  available_fields = row.keys.select { |k| k.match?(/|/) }
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  error_msg = ""
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  error_msg += ": #{available_fields.join(', ')}" if available_fields.any?
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  validation_errors << error_msg
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                unless operation_notes.present?
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  validation_errors << ""
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                unless received_at_str.present?
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  available_time_fields = row.keys.select { |k| k.match?(/|/) }
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  error_msg = ": #{FIELD_MAPPINGS[:received_at].join('  ')}"
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  error_msg += ": #{available_time_fields.join(', ')}" if available_time_fields.any?
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  validation_errors << error_msg
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                if validation_errors.any?
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  @error_count += 1
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  @errors << " #{row_number} : #{validation_errors.join('; ')}"
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  return
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                end
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                # 
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                tracking_number = operation_notes&.match(TRACKING_NUMBER_REGEX)&.captures&.first&.strip
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                unless tracking_number.present?
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  @error_count += 1
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  @errors << " #{row_number} : : 'XXXXXX'"
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  return
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                # 
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                reimbursement = Reimbursement.find_by(invoice_number: document_number)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                unless reimbursement
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                  @unmatched_receipts << {
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                    row: row_number,
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                    document_number: document_number,
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                    tracking_number: tracking_number,
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                    error: ""
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  }
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  return
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                # 
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                received_at = parse_datetime_enhanced(received_at_str, row_number)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                return unless received_at # parse_datetime_enhanced 
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                # 
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                process_work_order(row_number, document_number, tracking_number, received_at, filling_id, reimbursement)
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

              end
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

              
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

              def parse_datetime_enhanced(datetime_string, row_number)
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                return nil unless datetime_string.present?
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                if datetime_string.is_a?(Date) || datetime_string.is_a?(DateTime) || datetime_string.is_a?(Time)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                  return datetime_string
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                datetime_str = datetime_string.to_s.strip
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                return nil if datetime_str.blank?
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                # Excel
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                if datetime_str.match?(/^\d+(\.\d+)?$/)
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                  @error_count += 1
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  @errors << " #{row_number} : Excel: '#{datetime_str}'"
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                  return nil
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                end
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                begin
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                  return DateTime.parse(datetime_str)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                  common_formats = [
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                    '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S',
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                    '%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S',
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                    '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M',
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                    '%Y/%m/%d %H:%M',
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                    '%Y-%m-%d',
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                    '%Y/%m/%d'
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                  ]
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                  
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                  common_formats.each do |format|
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                      result = DateTime.strptime(datetime_str, format)
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.debug " #{row_number} :  '#{format}' : #{result}"
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                      return result
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                    rescue ArgumentError
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                      # 
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                    end
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                  end
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                  
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                  @error_count += 1
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                  @errors << " #{row_number} :  '#{datetime_str}': #{common_formats.join(', ')}"
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                  return nil
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                end
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

              end
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

              
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

              def process_work_order(row_number, document_number, tracking_number, received_at, filling_id, reimbursement)
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                if filling_id.present?
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                  work_order = ExpressReceiptWorkOrder.find_by(filling_id: filling_id)
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                  unless work_order
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                    @error_count += 1
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                    @errors << " #{row_number} : ID (Filling ID: #{filling_id})"
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                    return
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                  end
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                  
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                  update_work_order(work_order, row_number, document_number, tracking_number, received_at, reimbursement)
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                else
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                  create_work_order(row_number, document_number, tracking_number, received_at, reimbursement)
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                end
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

              end
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

              
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

              def update_work_order(work_order, row_number, document_number, tracking_number, received_at, reimbursement)
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                  if work_order.update(
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                    reimbursement: reimbursement,
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                    tracking_number: tracking_number,
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                    received_at: received_at,
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                    created_by: @current_admin_user.id
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                  )
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                    @created_count += 1
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                    reimbursement.mark_as_received(received_at)
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                    reset_notification_status(reimbursement)
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                  else
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                    @error_count += 1
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                    error_messages = work_order.errors.full_messages.join(', ')
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                    @errors << " #{row_number}  (: #{document_number}):  - #{error_messages}"
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                    raise ActiveRecord::Rollback
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                  end
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                end
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

              end
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

              
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

              def create_work_order(row_number, document_number, tracking_number, received_at, reimbursement)
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                # 
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

                if ExpressReceiptWorkOrder.exists?(reimbursement_id: reimbursement.id, tracking_number: tracking_number)
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                  @skipped_count += 1
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                  return
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

                end
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                work_order = ExpressReceiptWorkOrder.new(
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

                  reimbursement: reimbursement,
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                  status: 'completed',
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

                  tracking_number: tracking_number,
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

                  received_at: received_at,
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                  created_by: @current_admin_user.id
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

                )
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

                
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

                  if work_order.save
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

                    @created_count += 1
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

                    reimbursement.mark_as_received(received_at)
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

                    reset_notification_status(reimbursement)
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

                  else
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

                    @error_count += 1
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            

                    error_messages = work_order.errors.full_messages.join(', ')
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

                    @errors << " #{row_number}  (: #{document_number}):  - #{error_messages}"
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            

                    raise ActiveRecord::Rollback
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            

                  end
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            

                end
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            

              rescue StateMachines::InvalidTransition => e
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

                @error_count += 1
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

                @errors << " #{row_number}  (: #{document_number}):  - #{e.message}"
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

              end
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

              
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            

              def reset_notification_status(reimbursement)
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            

                if reimbursement.last_viewed_express_receipts_at.present?
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

                  reimbursement.update_column(:last_viewed_express_receipts_at, nil)
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug " ##{reimbursement.id} "
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

                end
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            

              end
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            

              
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            

              def generate_import_result
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            

                # 
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            

                error_categories = categorize_errors
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            

                
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            

                result = {
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            

                  success: true,
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            

                  created: @created_count,
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            

                  skipped: @skipped_count,
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355.

      356.

                  errors: @error_count,
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357.

    358. 
            

            

                  unmatched_details: @unmatched_receipts,

                  error_summary: {
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360.

                if @error_count > 0 || @unmatched_receipts.any?

              def categorize_errors
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            

            

                categories = {
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            

            

                  field_missing: 0,
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            

                  time_format: 0,
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            

            

                  tracking_number: 0,
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            

            

                  reimbursement_not_found: 0,
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            

            

                  validation: 0,
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            

            

                  other: 0
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            

            

                }
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            

            

                
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            

            

                @errors.each do |error|
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            

            

                  case error
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            

            

                  when /.*/
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            

            

                    categories[:field_missing] += 1
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            

            

                  when /|/
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            

            

                    categories[:time_format] += 1
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            

                  when //
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            

                    categories[:tracking_number] += 1
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            

            

                  when /||/
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393.

      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394.

                    categories[:other] += 1

                  end
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            

            

                end
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            

            

                
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            

            

                categories[:reimbursement_not_found] = @unmatched_receipts.count
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            

            

                categories

      402.

              def calculate_success_rate
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            

            

                total = @created_count + @skipped_count + @error_count + @unmatched_receipts.count
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            

            

                return 0 if total == 0
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            

            

                
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            

            

                ((@created_count + @skipped_count).to_f / total * 100).round(2)
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            

            

              end
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            

            

              
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            

            

              def generate_suggestions(error_categories)
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            

            

                suggestions = []
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            

            

                
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            

            

                if error_categories[:field_missing] > 0
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            

            

                  suggestions << "Excel"
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            

            

                  suggestions << ""
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            

            

                  FIELD_MAPPINGS.each do |field, names|
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            

            

                    suggestions << "  - #{field}: #{names.join('  ')}"
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            

            

                  end
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            

            

                end
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            

            

                
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            

            

                if error_categories[:time_format] > 0
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            

            

                  suggestions << " '2025-01-01 10:00:00'"
          
      423. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    423. 
            

            

                end
          
      424. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    424. 
            

            

                
          
      425. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    425. 
            

            

                if error_categories[:tracking_number] > 0
          
      426. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    426. 
            

            

                  suggestions << " 'XXXXXX' "
          
      427. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    427. 
            

            

                end
          
      428. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    428. 
            

            

                
          
      429. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    429. 
            

            

                if error_categories[:reimbursement_not_found] > 0
          
      430. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    430. 
            

            

                  suggestions << "Excel"
          
      431. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    431. 
            

            

                end
          
      432. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    432. 
            

            

                
          
      433. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    433. 
            

            

                suggestions << ""
          
      434. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    434. 
            

            

                suggestions
          
      435. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    435. 
            

            

              end
          
      436. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    436. 
            

            

            end

              def initialize(file, current_admin_user)

    6. 
            

            

                @imported_count = 0

    7. 
            

            

                @skipped_count = 0 #

              def import(test_spreadsheet = nil)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                return { success: false, errors: [""] } unless @file.present?
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                # SQLite
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                @optimization_manager.during_import do

    21. 
            

            

                  perform_import(test_spreadsheet)

      23.

      24.

              def perform_import(test_spreadsheet = nil)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                begin
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  file_path = @file.respond_to?(:tempfile) ? @file.tempfile.to_path.to_s : @file.path
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  extension = File.extname(file_path).delete('.').downcase.to_sym
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  spreadsheet = test_spreadsheet || Roo::Spreadsheet.open(file_path, extension: extension)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # Handle both Excel and CSV files
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  sheet = if spreadsheet.respond_to?(:sheet)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                            spreadsheet.sheet(0)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                          else
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                            spreadsheet # Directly use spreadsheet if it's a CSV
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                          end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  headers = sheet.row(1).map { |h| h.to_s.strip }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  sheet.each_with_index do |row, idx|
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    next if idx == 0
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    row_data = Hash[headers.zip(row)]
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    import_operation_history(row_data, idx + 1)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  {
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    success: true,
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    imported: @imported_count,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    skipped: @skipped_count,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    updated_reimbursements: @updated_reimbursement_count,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    unmatched: @unmatched_histories.count,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    errors: @error_count,
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    error_details: @errors,
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    unmatched_histories: @unmatched_histories
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  }
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Operation History Import Failed: #{e.message}\n#{e.backtrace.join("\n")}"
          
      59.

      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                end
          
      61.

              end
          
      62.
