              def import(test_spreadsheet = nil)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                return { success: false, errors: [""] } unless @file.present?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                begin
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  # 1. 
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  all_rows_data = parse_all_rows(test_spreadsheet)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  return { success: false, errors: [""] } if all_rows_data.empty?
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  # 2. 
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  validated_data = validate_and_preprocess_data(all_rows_data)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  # 3. 
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  disabled_callbacks = [
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    [:save, :after, :update_status_based_on_fee_details],
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    [:create, :after, :update_notification_status],
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    [:update, :after, :update_notification_status]
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  ]
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  @batch_manager.batch_import_with_disabled_callbacks(validated_data, disabled_callbacks) do |batch|
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    process_reimbursement_batch(batch)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  # 4. 
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  batch_update_statuses(validated_data)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  # 5. 
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  @results[:performance_stats] = @batch_manager.performance_stats
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  @results[:success] = true
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Optimized reimbursement import completed: #{@results}"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  @results
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                rescue Roo::FileNotFound => e
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Optimized Reimbursement Import Failed: File not found - #{e.message}"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: [": #{e.message}"] }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                rescue CSV::MalformedCSVError => e
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Optimized Reimbursement Import Failed: Malformed CSV - #{e.message}"
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: ["CSV: #{e.message}"] }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error "Optimized Reimbursement Import Failed: #{e.message}\n#{e.backtrace.join("\n")}"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  { success: false, errors: [": #{e.message}"] }
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              # Make this method public for testing
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              def batch_update_statuses(validated_data)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                # 
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Starting batch status updates..."
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                invoice_numbers = validated_data.map { |data| data[:invoice_number] }.uniq
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                # 
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                reimbursements_to_update = Reimbursement.where(invoice_number: invoice_numbers)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                updated_count = 0
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                reimbursements_to_update.each do |reimbursement|
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  external_status = validated_data.find { |d| d[:invoice_number] == reimbursement.invoice_number }&.dig(:external_status)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  if external_status.present?
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    # 
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    new_status = reimbursement.determine_internal_status_from_external(external_status)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    # 
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    if new_status != reimbursement.status || external_status != reimbursement.last_external_status
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                      reimbursement.update!(
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                        external_status: external_status,
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                        last_external_status: external_status,
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                        status: new_status
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                      )
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      updated_count += 1
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Batch updated #{updated_count} reimbursement statuses"
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

              end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              private
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              def parse_all_rows(test_spreadsheet)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                file_path = @file.respond_to?(:tempfile) ? @file.tempfile.to_path.to_s : @file.path
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                extension = File.extname(file_path).delete('.').downcase.to_sym
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                spreadsheet = test_spreadsheet || Roo::Spreadsheet.open(file_path, extension: extension)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                sheet = spreadsheet.respond_to?(:sheet) ? spreadsheet.sheet(0) : spreadsheet
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                headers = sheet.row(1).map { |h| h.to_s.strip }
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                # 
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                expected_headers = ['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                missing_headers = expected_headers - headers
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                unless missing_headers.empty?
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, ": #{missing_headers.join(', ')}"
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                # 
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                rows_data = []
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                sheet.each_with_index do |row, idx|
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  next if idx == 0 # Skip header row
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  row_data = Hash[headers.zip(row)]
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  row_data[:row_number] = idx + 1
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  rows_data << row_data
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Parsed #{rows_data.size} rows from import file"
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                rows_data
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

              
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              def validate_and_preprocess_data(all_rows_data)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                valid_data = []
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                all_rows_data.each do |row_data|
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  invoice_number = row_data['']&.strip
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  if invoice_number.blank?
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    @results[:errors] += 1
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    @results[:error_details] << " #{row_data[:row_number]}: "
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    next
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  processed_data = {
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    invoice_number: invoice_number,
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    document_name: row_data[''],
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                    applicant: row_data[''],
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    applicant_id: row_data[''],
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    company: row_data[''],
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    department: row_data[''],
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                    amount: row_data[''],
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                    receipt_status: parse_receipt_status(row_data['']),
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    receipt_date: parse_date(row_data['']),
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    submission_date: parse_date(row_data['']),
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    is_electronic: row_data['']&.include?('') || false,
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    external_status: row_data[''],
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    approval_date: parse_datetime(row_data['']),
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    approver_name: row_data[''],
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    related_application_number: row_data[''],
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155.

      156.

      157.

                    # ERP fields
          
      158.

      159.

                    erp_current_approver: row_data[''],
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    erp_flexible_field_2: row_data['2'],
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    erp_node_entry_time: parse_datetime(row_data['']),
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    erp_first_submitted_at: parse_datetime(row_data['']),
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    erp_flexible_field_8: row_data['8'],
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                    # 
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    row_number: row_data[:row_number]
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  }
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  valid_data << processed_data
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                
          
      171.

                Rails.logger.info "Validated #{valid_data.size} records, #{@results[:errors]} errors"
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                valid_data
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              end
          
      174.

              def process_reimbursement_batch(batch)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                # 1. 
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                invoice_numbers = batch.map { |data| data[:invoice_number] }.compact.uniq
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                existing_reimbursements = @batch_manager.batch_find_existing(:invoice_number, invoice_numbers)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                # 2. 
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                new_records = []
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                update_records = []
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                batch.each do |data|
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  invoice_number = data[:invoice_number]
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  existing_record = existing_reimbursements[invoice_number]
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  attributes = data.except(:row_number)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  if existing_record
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                    # ID
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                    update_records << attributes.merge(
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                      id: existing_record.id,
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                      created_at: existing_record.created_at
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    )
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  else
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    # 
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    new_records << attributes.merge(
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                      status: Reimbursement::STATUS_PENDING
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                    )
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                # 3. 
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Processing batch: #{new_records.size} new, #{update_records.size} updates"
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                created_count = 0
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                updated_count = 0
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                if new_records.any?
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  created_count = @batch_manager.batch_insert(new_records)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  @results[:created] += created_count
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                if update_records.any?
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  updated_count = @batch_manager.batch_update(update_records, unique_by: :id)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                  @results[:updated] += updated_count
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                end
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Batch processed: #{created_count} created, #{updated_count} updated"
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

              end
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

              
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

              
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

              def process_in_batches(data_array, &block)
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                @batch_manager.send(:process_in_batches, data_array, &block)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

              end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

              
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

              # 
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

              def parse_receipt_status(status)
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                return nil unless status.present?
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                status.include?('') ? 'received' : 'pending'
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

              end
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

            
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

              def parse_date(date_string)
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                return nil unless date_string.present?
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                begin
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                  date_string.is_a?(Date) || date_string.is_a?(DateTime) ? date_string.to_date : Date.parse(date_string.to_s)
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

              end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

              def parse_datetime(datetime_string)
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                return nil unless datetime_string.present?
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                begin
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  datetime_string.is_a?(Date) || datetime_string.is_a?(DateTime) ? datetime_string : DateTime.parse(datetime_string.to_s)
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                rescue ArgumentError
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                end
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

              end
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

            end
          
      253.

    app/services/problem_code_import_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    101 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 101 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # app/services/problem_code_import_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            require 'csv'
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            class ProblemCodeImportService
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              def initialize(file_path)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @file_path = file_path
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              def import
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                result = initialize_result
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                begin
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  #  UTF-8 aBOM
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  content = File.read(@file_path, encoding: 'bom|utf-8')
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "========== [Debug Import] File content read with BOM|UTF-8 encoding. =========="
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "  Content encoding before processing: #{content.encoding.name}"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "  Content starts with (first 50 chars): #{content[0..49].dump}"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  content.strip!
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  # BOM should be removed by 'bom|utf-8', but we can log for verification
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  original_length = content.bytesize
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  content.sub!("\xEF\xBB\xBF", '')
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  new_length = content.bytesize
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "  BOM removal check: #{original_length - new_length} bytes removed."
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "  Content encoding after processing: #{content.encoding.name}"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "  Content starts with after processing (first 50 chars): #{content[0..49].dump}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "========== [Debug Import] Starting CSV parsing... =========="
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  CSV.parse(content, headers: true, encoding: 'UTF-8').each.with_index do |row, index|
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "  Processing row #{index + 1}: #{row.to_h.inspect}"
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    process_row(row, result)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "========== [Debug Import] CSV parsing finished. =========="
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  result[:success] = false
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  result[:error] = e.message
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                result
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              private
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              def initialize_result
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                { success: true, error: nil, details: { fee_types: [], problem_types: [] } }
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              def process_row(row, result)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                fee_type_params = {
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  reimbursement_type_code: row['reimbursement_type_code'],
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  meeting_type_code: format_code_value(row['meeting_type_code']),
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  expense_type_code: format_code_value(row['expense_type_code']),
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  name: row['expense_type_name'],
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  meeting_name: row['meeting_type_name']
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                }
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                problem_type_params = {
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  issue_code: format_code_value(row['issue_code']),
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  title: row['problem_title'],
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  sop_description: row['sop_description'],
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  standard_handling: row['standard_handling'],
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                }
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                # Skip if essential data is missing
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                return if fee_type_params.values_at(:reimbursement_type_code, :meeting_type_code, :expense_type_code).any?(&:blank?)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                return if problem_type_params.values.any?(&:blank?)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                # Process FeeType
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                fee_type, fee_type_action = process_fee_type(fee_type_params)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                update_result_with_action(result, :fee_types, fee_type_action, fee_type.as_json)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                # Process ProblemType
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                problem_type, problem_type_action = process_problem_type(problem_type_params, fee_type)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                update_result_with_action(result, :problem_types, problem_type_action, problem_type.as_json)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              def process_fee_type(params)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                fee_type = FeeType.find_or_initialize_by(
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  reimbursement_type_code: params[:reimbursement_type_code],
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  meeting_type_code: params[:meeting_type_code],
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  expense_type_code: params[:expense_type_code]
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                )
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                action = fee_type.new_record? ? :imported : :updated
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86.

      90.

                  active: true
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                )
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                fee_type.save! if fee_type.changed?
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                [fee_type, action]
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              end
          
      97.

              def process_problem_type(params, fee_type)
          
      99.

                )

              def update_result_with_action(result, type, action, details)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                return unless action
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                details['action'] = action
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                result[:details][type] << details
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

              end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              def format_code_value(value)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                return nil if value.nil? || value.to_s.strip.empty?
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                # 
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                code_str = value.to_s.strip
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                # 2
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                return code_str if code_str.match?(/^\d{2}$/)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                # 10
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                return code_str.rjust(2, '0') if code_str.match?(/^\d$/)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                #  "00"
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                return code_str if code_str == '00'
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                # 
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                code_str
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

              end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            end
          
      146.

            class ProblemCodeMigrationService

              def self.migrate_to_new_structure
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  migrate_fee_types
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  migrate_problem_types
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                end
          
      8.

              end

              def self.migrate_fee_types
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # Create default meeting types if they don't exist
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                personal_type = FeeType.find_or_create_by(code: "00", title: "", meeting_type: "")
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                academic_type = FeeType.find_or_create_by(code: "01", title: "", meeting_type: "")
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                # Migrate existing fee types if any
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                FeeType.where(code: nil).find_each.with_index do |fee_type, index|
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  # Determine meeting type based on name or other logic
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  meeting_type = determine_meeting_type(fee_type.name)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  # Generate a unique code
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  code = generate_unique_code(fee_type, index)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  # Update the fee type
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  fee_type.update(
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    code: code,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    title: fee_type.name, # Use existing name as title
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    meeting_type: meeting_type,
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    active: true
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  )
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              
          
      35.

              def self.migrate_problem_types
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                ProblemType.where(code: nil).find_each.with_index do |problem_type, index|
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  # Determine fee_type based on problem_type name or other logic
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  fee_type = determine_fee_type(problem_type)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  # Generate a unique code within the fee_type
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  code = generate_unique_problem_code(problem_type, fee_type, index)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  # Get or create default SOP and handling if not available

    44.

    45. 
            

            

                  standard_handling = get_standard_handling(problem_type)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  # Update the problem type
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  problem_type.update(
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    code: code,

      55.

      56.

              def self.determine_meeting_type(name)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                # Logic to determine meeting type based on name
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                # This is a simple example - you would need more sophisticated logic based on your data
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                return "" if name.to_s.include?("") || name.to_s.include?("") || name.to_s.include?("")
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                return "" if name.to_s.include?("") || name.to_s.include?("") || name.to_s.include?("")

    64.

              def self.determine_fee_type(problem_type)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                # Logic to determine fee_type based on problem_type name or other attributes
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                # Since document_category is no longer available, we'll use the problem_type name
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                name = problem_type.name.to_s
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                if name.include?("") || name.include?("") || name.include?("")
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  return FeeType.find_by(meeting_type: "") || FeeType.first
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                elsif name.include?("") || name.include?("") || name.include?("")
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  return FeeType.find_by(meeting_type: "") || FeeType.first
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                # Default to first fee type if no match
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                FeeType.first
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81.

              def self.generate_unique_code(fee_type, index)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                # Generate a unique code for fee_type
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                base_code = (index + 10).to_s # Start from "10" to avoid conflicts
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                # Ensure code is unique
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                while FeeType.exists?(code: base_code)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  base_code = (base_code.to_i + 1).to_s
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                base_code
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

              end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              def self.generate_unique_problem_code(problem_type, fee_type, index)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                # Generate a unique code for problem_type within fee_type
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                base_code = (index + 10).to_s # Start from "10" to avoid conflicts
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                # Ensure code is unique within fee_type
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                while ProblemType.exists?(code: base_code, fee_type_id: fee_type.id)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  base_code = (base_code.to_i + 1).to_s
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                base_code
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

              end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

              
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

              def self.get_sop_description(problem_type)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                # Try to get SOP description from problem_descriptions if available
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                description = problem_type.problem_descriptions.first&.description if problem_type.respond_to?(:problem_descriptions)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                description.presence || "" # Default if not available
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

              end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              def self.get_standard_handling(problem_type)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                # This is a placeholder - you would need to implement based on your data
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                "" # Default
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

              end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            end
          
      117.

    app/services/problem_finder_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    41 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 41 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # app/services/problem_finder_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            class ProblemFinderService
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # This service implements the final, nuanced logic for finding applicable problem types.
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # It balances the need for precise matching with the reality of unstructured user input.
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # The strategy is "Best-Effort Precise Match + Guaranteed General Match".
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def self.find_for(reimbursement, fee_detail)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # Step 1: Determine the reliable context.
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                rt_code = determine_reimbursement_type(reimbursement)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                mt_code = fee_detail.flex_field_7
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                return ProblemType.none if rt_code.blank? || mt_code.blank?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # Step 2: Perform the "Best-Effort Precise Match".
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # We take the user-entered string from `fee_detail.fee_type` and try to find a matching
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                # `FeeType` record within the same reimbursement and meeting context.
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                matched_fee_type = FeeType.find_by(
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  reimbursement_type_code: rt_code,
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  meeting_type_code: mt_code,
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  name: fee_detail.fee_type
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                )
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                precise_et_code = matched_fee_type&.expense_type_code
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                # Step 3: Build the scopes.
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                # Always include the "General" problems for this context.
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                general_scope = ProblemType.where(
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  reimbursement_type_code: rt_code,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  meeting_type_code: mt_code,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  expense_type_code: '00'
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                )
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                # If we found a precise match, include those problems as well.
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                if precise_et_code.present?
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  precise_scope = ProblemType.where(
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    reimbursement_type_code: rt_code,
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    meeting_type_code: mt_code,
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    expense_type_code: precise_et_code
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  )
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  # Combine both scopes with a UNION.
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  ProblemType.from(
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    "(#{precise_scope.to_sql} UNION #{general_scope.to_sql}) AS problem_types"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  )
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                else
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  # If no precise match was found, just return the general problems.
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  general_scope
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              private
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              def self.determine_reimbursement_type(reimbursement)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                case reimbursement.document_name
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                when /^/
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  'EN'
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                when /^/
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  'MN'
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                else
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            end
          
      63.

    app/services/problem_type_query_service.rb

            # app/services/problem_type_query_service.rb
